price: 8. Waxaa ka mid ah dadka mid ka dooda arrinka Alle isagoon u haysan cilmi ama hanuun, ama kitaab wax ifaya.
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يُجَٰدِلُ فِي ٱللَّهِ بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٖ وَلَا هُدٗى وَلَا كِتَٰبٖ مُّنِيرٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamina al-nāsi man yujādilu fī al-lahi bighayri ʿil'min walā hudan walā kitābin munīrin
